title: CHICAGO PD RIOT CONTROL DONS UN BLUE HELMETS FOR RIOT CONTROL-CONDITIONING THE USA
text: CHICAGO PD RIOT CONTROL DONS UN BLUE HELMETS FOR RIOT CONTROL-CONDITIONING THE USA Submitted by Dave Hodges on Wednesday, August 21, 2024 - 23:49. Comments They obviously arent outsmarting everybody...but they sure are outsmarting most everybody. The vast majority of people who see that blue wont think anything of it. The problem with government two fold. First is people who are as ignorant of the issues as anybody could. Second is those who do know it implies and cooperating...even if its just a matter of remaining silent. Its isn't just about knowing how evil our society has become but also about understanding how incapable our government is to do anything about. The elitist mafia plots against society move forward almost entirely without hindrance...in a fashion that makes it seem reasonable to say we dont have any representative government at all. Rich people always have run society. [They obviously arentâ€¦](/comment/107961#comment-107961) Comment They obviously arent outsmarting everybody...but they sure are outsmarting most everybody. The vast majority of people who see that blue wont think anything of it. The problem with government two fold. First is people who are as ignorant of the issues as anybody could. Second is those who do know it implies and cooperating...even if its just a matter of remaining silent. Its isn't just about knowing how evil our society has become but also about understanding how incapable our government is to do anything about. The elitist mafia plots against society move forward almost entirely without hindrance...in a fashion that makes it seem reasonable to say we dont have any representative government at all. Rich people always have run society. [No...](/comment/107965#comment-107965) Comment The light blue is representative of the Chicago River, the 2 stripes on the Chicago flag represent the 2 branches of the river. It's NOT indicative of the UN, or conditioning. This shade of blue has been the color of the Chicago Police (and the City of Chicago) for decades, long before the UN even came into existence.
